meta.name: CEC Boiler Sensors-Template
meta.description: template created from dashboard: CEC Boiler Sensors

attributes.name: Campus Energy Centre Boiler B-1 Exhaust O2

queries.text:
if v.anomaly_type == "manual_anomaly"
  then (from(bucket: "MDS2021")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TRAINING_ANOMALY")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "val_num")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uniqueID"] == "Campus Energy Centre Boiler B-1 Exhaust O2")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement", "manual_anomaly"])
  |> rename(columns: {manual_anomaly: "anomaly"})
)
else if v.anomaly_type == "model_anomaly"
  then (from(bucket: "MDS2021")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TRAINING_ANOMALY")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "val_num")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uniqueID"] == "Campus Energy Centre Boiler B-1 Exhaust O2")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement", "model_anomaly"])
  |> rename(columns: {model_anomaly: "anomaly"})
)
else 
  (from(bucket: "MDS2021")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "PREDICT_ANOMALY")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "val_num")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uniqueID"] == "Campus Energy Centre Boiler B-1 Exhaust O2")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement", "realtime_anomaly"])
  |> rename(columns: {realtime_anomaly: "anomaly"})
)
